ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.strategies
Interface IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy

All Superinterfaces:
IStrategy
All Known Implementing Classes:
MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCircles, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCombine, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCurvature, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyEdges, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyHalfCircle, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyLines, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyLog, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyNone, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyPrediction, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyRemoveTiny, MicroGestureDetectionStrategySmoothing
public interface IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy
extends IStrategy

Interface to describe a strategy detecting MicroGestures in the TouchPoints of the given MicroGestures and returning the detected MicroGestures.

Author:
Julian Hanhart, Dominik Giger
